verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Amos <S%H5986><s%>, who was among the herdsmen <S%H5349><s%> of Tekoa <S%H8620><s%>, which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, two years <S%H8141><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will roar <S%H7580><s%> from Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and utter <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; and the pastures <S%H4999><s%> of the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> shall mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the top <S%H7218><s%> of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> shall wither <S%H3001><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>, and for four <S%H702><s%>, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> the punishment there <S%H1758><s%>; because they have threshed Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with threshing instruments <S%H2742><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>:
But I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Hazael <S%H2371><s%>, which shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> of Ben <S%H1130><s%>â€“hadad.

I will break <S%H7665><s%> also the bar <S%H1280><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> from the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Aven <S%H206><s%>, and him that holds <S%H8551><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> shall go into captivity <S%H1540><s%> unto Kir <S%H7024><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, and for four <S%H702><s%>, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> the punishment there <S%H1540><s%>; because they carried away captive the whole <S%H8003><s%> captivity <S%H1546><s%>, to deliver them up <S%H5462><s%> to Edom <S%H123><s%>:
But I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, which shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces there <S%H759><s%>:

And I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> from Ashdod <S%H795><s%>, and him that holds <S%H8551><s%> the scepter <S%H7626><s%> from Ashkelon <S%H831><s%>, and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against Ekron <S%H6138><s%>: and the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, and for four <S%H702><s%>, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> the punishment there <S%H5462><s%>; because they delivered up the whole <S%H8003><s%> captivity <S%H1546><s%> to Edom <S%H123><s%>, and remembered <S%H2142><s%> not the brotherly <S%H251><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>:
But I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Tyrus <S%H6865><s%>, which shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces there <S%H759><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, and for four <S%H702><s%>, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> the punishment there <S%H7291><s%>; because he did pursue his brother <S%H251><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and did cast off <S%H7843><s%> all pity <S%H7356><s%>, and his anger <S%H639><s%> did tear <S%H2963><s%> perpetually <S%H5703><s%>, and he kept <S%H8104><s%> his wrath <S%H5678><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>:
But I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> upon Teman <S%H8487><s%>, which shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> of Bozrah <S%H1224><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; For three <S%H7969><s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and for four <S%H702><s%>, I will not turn away <S%H7725><s%> the punishment there <S%H1234><s%>; because they have ripped up the women with child <S%H2030><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, that they might enlarge <S%H7337><s%> their border <S%H1366><s%>:

But I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>, and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> the palaces <S%H759><s%> there <S%H8643><s%>, with shouting in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H4421><s%>, with a storm <S%H5591><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the whirlwind <S%H5492><s%>:
And their king <S%H4428><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>, he and his princes <S%H8269><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
